definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: Do the process instructions reference available visual aids?
sentences.chinese: 工序说明引用了有效的视觉教具了吗？

sentences.english: Sometimes people think there is something magic about sensorial math materials.
sentences.chinese: 有时人们认为数学教具是神奇的事物。

sentences.english: The teacher makes use of usual aids and other objects and materials to aid comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 教师应使用教具以及各种材料，以帮助幼儿理解。

sentences.english: If time and place allow, consider and prepare audio-visual aids.
sentences.chinese: 如果时间和地点允许的话，考虑并准备好视听教具。

sentences.english: An angle trisecting unit belongs to teaching aids for teaching.
sentences.chinese: 三等分角器是属于教学用的教具。

sentences.english: Teachers should focus on creative lesson plans that are diverse and use a wide range realia.
sentences.chinese: 教师应注重教案的多样化和使用各种教具协助教学。

sentences.english: Our English teacher often uses visual aids in her classes.
sentences.chinese: 我们英语老师上课经常用直观教具。

sentences.english: She taught Jane knowledge with audio-visual aids.
sentences.chinese: 她用直观教具教简学习知识。

sentences.english: This article introduces the exploitation design thoughts and the structure functions of the realia of the new mathematics system.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了新数学教具的开发设计理念和结构功能。

definition: design of a learning environment for young children, incorporating artwork designed to appeal to them/abbr. to 環創|环创[huan2 chuang4]
early education (abbr. for 早期教育[zao3 qi1 jiao4 yu4])
lesson plan/teaching plan/a "missionary case" (a dispute over Christian missionaries during the late Qing)
eye-catching décor for young children (in classrooms, libraries etc) (posters, mobiles, murals etc) (abbr. for 環境創設|环境创设[huan2 jing4 chuang4 she4])
